localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Help your friends get a job by embedding a widget on your website where you point visitors to your friends for jobs that you're not available for. Create your widget in the online generator and embed it on your website using an iframe. It's as simple as that.
blogPost.body: Help your friends get a job by embedding a widget on your website where you point visitors to your friends for jobs that you're not available for. Create your widget in the online generator and embed it on your website using an iframe. It's as simple as that.
blogPost.title: Referrer - Painlessly refer your friends for jobs
blogPost.author: Albin Groen

localize.description: 通过在你的网站上嵌入一个小工具来帮助你的朋友找到一份工作，在那里你可以把访问者引导到你的朋友那里，寻找你找不到的工作。在在线生成器中创建您的小部件，并使用IFRAME将其嵌入到您的网站上。就这么简单。
localize.tagline: 毫不费力地推荐你的朋友找工作

localize.description: 通過在你的網站上嵌入一個小工具來幫助你的朋友找到一份工作，在那裏你可以把訪問者引導到你的朋友那裏，尋找你找不到的工作。在在線生成器中創建您的小部件，並使用IFRAME將其嵌入到您的網站上。就這麼簡單。
localize.tagline: 毫不費力地推薦你的朋友找工作

previous.excerpt: Meteostat is a meteorological database which provides historical weather and climate data for thousands of weather stations and places worldwide. The project features a convenient web app and data interfaces for developers.
previous.title: Meteostat - Historical weather and climate data

localize.description: 气象站是一个气象数据库，提供全球数千个气象站和地点的历史天气和气候数据。该项目的特点是为开发人员提供了方便的Web应用程序和数据接口。
氣象站是一個氣象數據庫，提供全球數千個氣象站和地點的歷史天氣和氣候數據。該項目的特點是爲開發人員提供了方便的Web應用程序和數據接口。
